text:
[Verse]
Raindrops fall let's go outside
Feel the stormy summer tide
Spin around don't need to hide
In the rain we take a ride

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain oh yeah
Let it wash away our cares
Feel the rhythm in the air
Every drop our hearts declare

[Verse 2]
Barefoot on the sidewalk slate
Puddle jumps don't hesitate
Wet hair wild it's our fate
Laughter echoes till it's late

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain oh yeah
Let it wash away our cares
Feel the rhythm in the air
Every drop our hearts declare

[Bridge]
Shadows fade in water's play
Night gives into breaking day
Hand in hand we find our way
In the rain we always stay

[Chorus]
Dancing in the rain oh yeah
Let it wash away our cares
Feel the rhythm in the air
Every drop our hearts declare
title: Dancing in the Rain
